hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: na hom mfa ndaase nweɔn wɔ mu;"

"Ewuranom: "na hom mbɔ mpaa mma hɛn so
hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: ma Nyankopɔn mbue asɛm no ano mma hɛn; ma yɛnka Kraest esumasɛm a osian ntsi ma meda nkyehoma mu no;"

"Ewuranom: "ama meeyi ato gua dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ me dɛ mekasa."
"Hom nnantsew nyansa mu wɔ hɔn a wɔwɔ nkyɛn no afamu
hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: na mma hom nsɛɛ hom ber kwa."

"Ewuranom: "Hom mma hom kasaa nyɛ dza adom nkyen wɔ mu daa
hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: ama hom eehu dza ɔsɛ dɛ hom dze bua obiara."

osiandɛ hom so wɔ owura wɔ sor.": onua dɔfo a ɔyɛ ɔsomfo nokwafo nye m’ewurakowaa wɔ Ewuradze mu no bɛka akyerɛ hom."

"Ewuranom: "Ɔno na iyiara ntsi masoma no hom nkyɛn
hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: ama hom eehu hɛn asetsena mu
osiandɛ hom so wɔ owura wɔ sor.": na ɔaaka hom akoma ato hom yamu."

hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: onua nokwafo dɔfo a ofi hom mu no ka no ho: hɔn na wɔbɛma hom ehu ha nsɛm nyina."

"Ewuranom: "Aristarkus a ɔyɛ me nyɛnko mpokyerɛnyi no kyia hom
osiandɛ hom so wɔ owura wɔ sor.": Barnabas n’awɔfase a hom enya no ho nkra dada dɛ

"Ewuranom: "nye Jesus a wɔfrɛ no Justus no kyia hom. Woyinom nko nye hɔn a wofi twatsiatwa mu nye me ayɛ edwuma wɔ Nyankopɔn ahendzi no ho; na wɔakyekye mo werɛ pii."
"Kraest n’akowaa Epafras a ofi hom mu no kyia hom
hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: odzi aper ma hom daa wɔ mpaabɔ mu
"#Efe 6.9": na hom nhyɛ ma wɔ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ nyina mu."

"Ewuranom: "Na midzi no dase dɛ ɔbɔɔ mbɔdzen pii maa hom nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Laodikea nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Hierapolis."
"Hom nkyia enuanom a wɔwɔ Laodikea nye Nimfas nye asɔr a ɔwɔ ne fie no."
"Na sɛ wɔkenkan nwoma yi wɔ hom mu wie a
hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: hom mma wɔnkɛkenkan no Laodikea asɔr mu so
osiandɛ hom so wɔ owura wɔ sor.": na hom so nkenkan dza ofi Laodikea no."

hom mfa dza ɔtsen na ɔfa kwan mu mma ho: Hwɛ ɔsom a wo nsa aka no Ewuradze mu no yie

"Ewuranom: "Nkyia a emi mara Paul medze me nsa kyerɛwee nye yi. Hom nkaa mo mpokyerɛ no. Adom nka hom nyina."
